actions.speaker: Team Metaluck
actions.text: Post creed/values deck to Symbiosis General Hub

actions.speaker: Sudheer
actions.text: Schedule 3–4h MVS integration & tech infrastructure alignment call w/ relevant leads

actions.speaker: Christopher Herghelegiu
actions.text: Post Anchor Circle updates to Symbiosis after each meeting

actions.speaker: Team Metaluck
actions.text: Post questions/discussion points in Symbiosis General Hub

actions.speaker: Nathalie Nebelius (Cordinata AB)
actions.text: Send bi-weekly Anchor Circle updates to ecosystem

recommendations.text: Finalize circle charters and roles ASAP to enable more distributed workload and clearer contribution pathways for all members.
Utilize the Symbiosis platform more actively for questions, discussions, and sharing updates to enhance transparency and engagement across the ecosystem.
Hold a dedicated session to define and align on the meaning of 'regeneration' within the context of Better World, ensuring a common understanding and intentional application in decision-making.

Expedite the establishment of the governance and communication circles, and clarify the representative link mechanism between circles and the Anchor Circle to improve communication flow and distributed power.
Schedule the proposed 3-4 hour MVS integration and tech infrastructure alignment call to address overlapping functionalities and create a cohesive operational framework.
Develop a clear compensation framework that values time and effort, providing transparency and pathways for financial abundance, while also encouraging a 'what can I give' mindset.
Maintain an open and safe space for communication, acknowledging and addressing tensions and uncertainties as opportunities for growth and collective learning.
